mapper.sql: id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, sort, code, type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_area
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update sys_area
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parent_ids = #{record.parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{record.sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_by = #{record.createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{record.updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},

update sys_area set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_ids = #{record.parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{record.sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{record.createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{record.updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}

update sys_area
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parent_ids = #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_area set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_ids = #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids, a.code, a.name, a.sort, a.type, a.remarks, a.create_by, a.create_date, a.update_by, a.update_date, a.del_flag FROM sys_area a LEFT JOIN sys_office p ON p.id = a.parent_id WHERE a.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY a.code

SELECT a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids, a.code, a.name, a.sort, a.type, a.remarks, a.create_by, a.create_date, a.update_by, a.update_date, a.del_flag FROM sys_area a LEFT JOIN sys_office p ON p.id = a.parent_id WHERE a.del_flag = '0' and a.parent_id !=0 ORDER BY a.code
